description: Lists the Amazon EKS clusters in your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Listing EKS clusters helps adversaries understand the cloud services being used and their configurations.
By listing clusters, attackers can infer the structure and number of accounts that manage these resources.
Knowing the clusters can help adversaries understand shared network resources within the EKS environment.
Identifying clusters can help adversaries in mapping the network services exposed by these clusters.
Identifying clusters helps in understanding the internal network architecture and relationships.

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListClusters to inventory AWS EKS clusters, identifying active clusters for further exploration or to pinpoint potential targets for subsequent attacks.
